name: fairmind-integration
description: Team collaboration agents and skills with Fairmind platform integration. Includes 12 specialized agents, 3 Fairmind-aware skills for TDD and code review, and full traceability from implementation plans to code.
author: Alexio Cassani

mcp.description: This plugin requires the Fairmind MCP server to be configured. It provides access to 40 tools across General, Studio, and Code categories for project management, requirements tracking, and cross-repository analysis.

documentation.installation: See README.md for installation instructions and Fairmind MCP server configuration
documentation.usage: See README.md for agent workflows and skill usage examples
